item.description:
*The best way to beat winter in Boston?  Sharing cocktails with new friends and dancing the night away!*

Come to lounge out at Minibar at 8:30pm - This is a great event to meet new people and to get your groove on! All members welcome, and feel free to bring a friend or two!

DETAILS: We will meet at 8:30pm at Minibar (51 Huntington Ave, inside the Copley Square Hotel) and head over to a dance venue (to be determined) around 10pm to beat the lines.  Venues do get busy as the night rolls on, so if you don't find the group, please give me a ring (646.541.0708). Please meet us at Minibar by 10pm, and get there early as to have time to meet folks. Cover: None for Minibar, but there may be a cover for the dance venue, around $10-$15.

FIND THE ORGANIZER: My picture is located on the left-hand side of the site. For help/questions, my cell: 646.541.0708.

Please dress appropriately as these are upscale venues. If traveling by T, Copley Square, Prudential and Back Bay Stations are the closest for Minibar.

Hope to see you there! Charlie
item.how_to_find_us: My picture is on the left hand side of the web site. Call me for assistance.

group.name: The Boston Night Life Meetup Group

item.name: Step It Up! Minibar drinks mixer and dancing on Friday, Feb 11!!
